verses.text: In my \w distress|strong="H6869"\w* I \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and he \w heard|strong="H6030"\w* me.

\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, from \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, \add and\add* from a \w deceitful|strong="H7423"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*.

What shall be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto thee? or what shall be \w done|strong="H3254"\w* unto thee, thou \w false|strong="H7423"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*?\f + \fr 120.3 \ft What shall be given…: or, What shall the deceitful tongue give unto thee? or, what shall is profit thee?\f*\f + \fr 120.3 \ft done: Heb. added\f*

\w Sharp|strong="H8150"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* of the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*, with \w coals|strong="H1513"\w* of \w juniper|strong="H7574"\w*.\f + \fr 120.4 \ft Sharp…: or, It is as the sharp arrows of the mighty man, with coals of juniper\f*

\w Woe|strong="H0190"\w* is me, that I \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* in \w Mesech|strong="H4902"\w*, \add that\add* I \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* of \w Kedar|strong="H6938"\w*!
My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* hath \w long|strong="H7227"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H7931"\w* with him that \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.
I \add am for\add* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: but when I \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, they \add are\add* for \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 120.7 \ft for peace: or, a man of peace\f*
